Text.Page:
I am alive thanks to you.

Bless you. I was about to lose all hope...
We must recover the Furnace Controller! Hurry and deliver this news!

Thulsa's Legion...

The Divine Furnace...

I wonder if Muhrak is safe...
I am ashamed... I was too afraid of dying and didn't even put up any resistance...
I don't want to die like this. Help!
